forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 52F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
